appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

appDesc.message: You can view Other Devices Tabs and Visit History on the sidebar.
appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

announcement__notice_1.message: This extension is produced by a personal user. This is not an official extension for Whale.

announcement__notice_2.message: Please leave your improvements and problems in the Whale Store comments.

announcement__tip_1.message: The 'Other Devices Tabs' list is automatically synchronized when this page opens. Click the 'Manual Sync' only when real-time variation is required.

announcement__tip_2.message: The 'History' list shows only the current device's history. To view the full history, including the records of other devices, click on the top 'Open Whale History Page'.

synced_tabs__no_synced_tabs.message: No tabs open on other devices

history__no_history_data.message: No history data found for that date.
